sentence.Network_en: She appears nightly on the television news, speaking for the State Department.
sentence.Network_cn: 她作为国务院的发言人，每晚都会出现在电视新闻中。

sentence.Network_en: Both his grandfathers were fired with an enthusiasm for public speaking.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的祖父和外公都热衷于演说。

sentence.Network_en: It would also train women union members in public speaking and decision-making.
sentence.Network_cn: 它还将培养工会的女性成员公开演讲和决策的能力。

auth_sentence.content: I have been speaking to my friend in Portugal.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have been speaking to my friend in Portugal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have been speaking to my friend in Portugal.

auth_sentence.content: People speaking to each other, one on one.
auth_sentence.res_content: People speaking to each other, one on one.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People speaking to each other, one on one.

auth_sentence.content: Roughly speaking, the same answer applies to both.
auth_sentence.res_content: Roughly speaking, the same answer applies to both.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Roughly speaking, the same answer applies to both.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自百度翻译。
